name: Coffin Poppin'
description:
Made in four days for the Finnish College Jam #3!

Theme: "Halloween"

Diversifiers
  • "Space Is Limited"
    • Closed off arena with limited space.
  • "Can't Stop Moving" 
    • No brakes or reverse; only turning, forward and boost.
  • "Inconvenient Weapon"
    • Recoil from firing affects the vehicle physics.
Credits
  • Jani Gröhn (Coding, Design, Music & SFX)
  • Violeta Ivanova (Support)
  • Art asset credits:
    • https://opengameart.org/content/kaykit-spooktober-seasonal-pack-11
    • https://free3d.com/3d-model/machinegun-turret-49234.html
    • https://www.dafont.com/ghostphobia.font
Goals and Tips:
  • Survive the the endless onslaught of enemy pumpkins as long as you can!
  • Every kill counts as one score point.
  • The rotating stone cubes also kill enemies, and are harmless to you.
  • Try to keep control of your hovertank by minding your forward rotation and firing direction.
  • Firing causes recoil in the opposite direction.
  • You always advance at a steady pace, firing and dashing affect this.
  • Use the dash to escape a tight spot, but be careful of bounces.
Controls:
  • "A" and "D" to Turn
  • "Mouse" to Aim
  • Hold "Left Click" to AutoFire
  • "Space" to Dash (can ram enemies, but it's super risky)
  • "R" to Retry
  • "ESC" to Return to Main Menu
  • "F11" to Reset High Score
